heroText: Born and raised in Italy, after travel around the world I finally settled in the sunny Barcelona, Spain. Well organized person, problem solver, with high attention to details. Looking forward to work in ambitious projects with positive people.
aboutHeadLine: I love create modern websites and apps.
aboutDescription: I’m always looking for new challenges and opportunities that can help me continue to become a better developer, and person overall. I have a passion for self-learning the latest techniques and tools. Improving each day to challenge my skills to become better at what I do.
latestWorksDescription: Here a couple of projects that I have done during the last period, if you are interested in seeing more on the topic, you will find
memoriesDescription: A simple social media app that allows users to post interesting events that happened in their lives. Full Stack MERN Application.
apollofyDescription: Music platform inspired by Spotify. Built with React, Redux, Tailwind, NodeJs, Express, MongoDB, FireBase.
trackerDescription: Keep track of your transactions with this app that show you a nice graph. Built using React, Context API, Material-UI, FireBase.
todoDescription: Classic todo app with a dark/light theme toggle and drag & drop for reordering. Built with React, Redux and styled-components.
punkApiDescription: Website that use the Punk API V2 to fetch Brewdog's beers and display it. Built using React, punk API V2, and Material UI.
blogDescription: The Blog: Thoughts on life, work and everything in between.
contactText: I'm currently available for freelance work. If you have a project that you want to get started or just fancy saying hey, get in touch.
formDescription: If you’d like to chat about a project please fill in the form below and I’ll get back within 1-2 days.
formEmailErrorWrong: Please enter a valid email address
formMessageError: Please be sure to drop me a message
error404HeadLine: You are in the middle of nowhere
error404Description: It’s embarrassing... This page does not seem to exist! This might be because you have typed the web address incorrectly, please check the spelling.
